body_html:
@cgarciae thanks for that, I'm using it!

I suppose one could pass parse_fn as an argument:

def to_tfrecord(ds, parse_fn, record_path):
    with tf.Session() as sess, tf.python_io.TFRecordWriter(record_path) as writer:
        generator = dataset_generator(ds, sess)
        
        for row in generator:
            example = parse_fn(row)
            writer.write(example.SerializeToString())
